mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num,writer,title,content,orgFileName,saveFileName,fileSize,regdate FROM qna_board ORDER BY num DESC) result1)
WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNum} AND rnum <= #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_board (num, writer, title, content, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, regdate) VALUES(qna_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{orgFileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num,writer,title,content,orgFileName,saveFileName,fileSize, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate, LAG(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num,1,0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM qna_board ) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
